title: Where Do I Belong?
creator_credit: Rita el-Khoury, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Rita el-Khoury travels to Lebanon every year. She calls Australia and Lebanon her home but it wasn’t until she was caught in the middle of the 2006 Israeli bombing of Beiruit that she fully appreciated what that meant.
creator_credit_for_label: Rita el-Khoury, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
